attributes.action: Declare the EU Referendum null and void due to Nigel Farage misinformation
attributes.background: I believe that the recent referendum to leave the EU was swayed by a significant margin due to the facts regarding promised £350m funding being diverted to the NHS. Nigel Farage has since admitted this was a mistake. I feel that more than 2% of the electorate would have based their vote on this lie.

rejection.details: Apologies, the link we previously sent was incorrect. We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
